titleStmt.title: Lusts dominion, or, The lascivious queen a tragedie / written by Christofer Marloe, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Marlowe, Christopher, 1564-1593.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F.K. and are to be sold by Robert Pollard ...,

notesStmt.note: "The epistle dedicatorie" signed: Fra. Kirkman, Jun.
Unjustifiably ascribed to Marlowe. Possibly identical with "The Spanish Moor's tragedy," by Dekker, Haughton and Day. Cf. Cambridge hist. of Eng. lit. ; DNB.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
